document.full_text: chicago's defense stifled lebron james and dwyane wade to set-up an easy 103-82 victory over the miami heat in the opening game of their eastern conference finals series on sunday.
document.title: bulls stifle heat in easy opening win
lines_and_colors: chicago's defense stifled lebron james and dwyane wade to set-up an easy 103-82 victory over the miami heat in the opening game of their eastern conference finals series on sunday.
